snippet: The San Francisco Giants are being defined by players like Ishikawa, a journeyman who had been contemplating retirement but who has made the most of an unexpected opportunity.
abstract: San Francisco Giants, who are striving for their third World Series title in five seasons, are being defined by players like Travis Ishikawa, career-long first baseman who is currently playing left field; Ishikawa had been contemplating retirement when he was offered the chance to fill in for team's injured outfielder Mike Morse.
lead_paragraph: The San Francisco Giants are being defined by players like Ishikawa, a journeyman who had been contemplating retirement but who has made the most of an unexpected opportunity.

headline.main: Giants’ Travis Ishikawa Makes the Most of a Chance to Revive His Career
headline.print_headline: A Giants Journeyman Makes the Most of a Chance to Revive His Career
